Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 111st overall pick, by Kansas City in 1967...
Injured on 9/1/1977 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 8/15/1980, off Bob Shirley (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/29/1980, off Don Buschhorn (NYM)...
Injured on 5/24/1981 with a Fractured Foot, out for 2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 9/3/1984...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1986, hitting .435 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/21/1987 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Houston on 5/6/1988...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 8/22/1988...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1990, hitting .542 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 7/9/1992...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York (N) on 7/16/1992...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/19/1992, off Donn Pall (CHC)...
